name: VNRecognizedText
desc: Text recognized in an image through a text recognition request.

items.name: var string: String
items.desc: The top candidate for recognized text.

items.name: var confidence: VNConfidence
items.desc: A normalized confidence score for the text recognition result.

items.name: func boundingBox(for: Range<String.Index>) -> VNRectangleObservation?
items.desc: Calculates the bounding box around the characters in the range of the string.
